description: White ground with grey transfer print; hunting scenes within border. In center 'Chateau de Chilham, Comte de Kent, Angleterre.'
markings: Marks: Medallion reading \'PAR BREVET D\'INVENTION Manuf.re d\'Impression sur Faience, Porcelaine, & c.\' in the center of the medallion the monogram standing for the owners of the factory -- Legros d\'Anizy, Coquerel and Stone. in the paste is impressed the word \'CREIL\' where the factory was located.
title: Plate
